languages.text: {n}Идира качает головой.{/n} "Не, Лорд-капитан, глухо! Все также брожу по отсекам, экипаж пугаю. Но вы не переживайте — я уверена, что как только мы близко окажемся... в общем, это я ни с чем не спутаю!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Идира качает головой.{/n} "Не, Лорд-капитан, глухо! Все также брожу по отсекам, экипаж пугаю. Но вы не переживайте — я уверена, что как только мы близко окажемся... в общем, это я ни с чем не спутаю!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira shakes her head.{/n} "No, Lord Captain, not a thing! And I'm wandering from bay to bay, scaring the crew. But don't worry — I'm sure that as soon as we get close... well, there'll be no mistaking it!"
languages.original_text: {n}Идира качает головой.{/n} "Не, Лорд-капитан, глухо! Все также брожу по отсекам, экипаж пугаю. Но вы не переживайте — я уверена, что как только мы близко окажемся... в общем, это я ни с чем не спутаю!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira shakes her head.{/n} "No, Lord Captain, not a thing! And I'm wandering from bay to bay, scaring the crew. But don't worry — I'm sure that as soon as we get close... well, there'll be no mistaking it!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira shakes her head.{/n} "No, Lord Captain, not a thing! And I'm wandering from bay to bay, scaring the crew. But don't worry — I'm sure that as soon as we get close... well, there'll be no mistaking it!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira shakes her head.{/n} "No, Lord Captain, not a thing! And I'm wandering from bay to bay, scaring the crew. But don't worry — I'm sure that as soon as we get close... well, there'll be no mistaking it!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉摇了摇头。{/n}“没有，舰长大人，什么都没有！至于我，我正忙着在甲板之间到处徘徊，吓唬那些船员。不过别担心，我相信只要咱们呆在一起……就肯定不会有问题！”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira shakes her head.{/n} "No, Lord Captain, not a thing! And I'm wandering from bay to bay, scaring the crew. But don't worry — I'm sure that as soon as we get close... well, there'll be no mistaking it!"

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉摇了摇头。{/n}“没有，舰长大人，什么都没有！至于我，我正忙着在甲板之间到处徘徊，吓唬那些船员。不过别担心，我相信只要咱们呆在一起……就肯定不会有问题！”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Idira shakes her head.{/n} "No, Lord Captain, not a thing! And I'm wandering from bay to bay, scaring the crew. But don't worry — I'm sure that as soon as we get close... well, there'll be no mistaking it!"

languages.text: {n}Idira niega con la cabeza.{/n} «¡No, Lord Capitán, nada de nada! Y voy de bahía a bahía, asustando a la tripulación. Pero no se preocupe: seguro que en cuanto nos acerquemos... bueno, ¡no habrá ninguna duda!».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira shakes her head.{/n} "No, Lord Captain, not a thing! And I'm wandering from bay to bay, scaring the crew. But don't worry — I'm sure that as soon as we get close... well, there'll be no mistaking it!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira niega con la cabeza.{/n} «¡No, Lord Capitán, nada de nada! Y voy de bahía a bahía, asustando a la tripulación. Pero no se preocupe: seguro que en cuanto nos acerquemos... bueno, ¡no habrá ninguna duda!».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}イディラは首を横に振る。{/n}「いいえ、ロード・キャプテン！あたいはベイからベイへとさまよい、クルーを怖がらせているわ。でもご心配なく。近づけばきっと…そう、間違えることはなくなるわ！」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira shakes her head.{/n} "No, Lord Captain, not a thing! And I'm wandering from bay to bay, scaring the crew. But don't worry — I'm sure that as soon as we get close... well, there'll be no mistaking it!"

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラは首を横に振る。{/n}「いいえ、ロード・キャプテン！あたいはベイからベイへとさまよい、クルーを怖がらせているわ。でもご心配なく。近づけばきっと…そう、間違えることはなくなるわ！」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "Nein, Lord Captain, nichts! Und ich wandere von Station zu Station und mache der Crew Angst. Aber keine Sorge, ich bin sicher, wenn wir uns nähern ... nun ja, dann wird es unverkennbar sein!"
languages.original_text: {n}Idira shakes her head.{/n} "No, Lord Captain, not a thing! And I'm wandering from bay to bay, scaring the crew. But don't worry — I'm sure that as soon as we get close... well, there'll be no mistaking it!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "Nein, Lord Captain, nichts! Und ich wandere von Station zu Station und mache der Crew Angst. Aber keine Sorge, ich bin sicher, wenn wir uns nähern ... nun ja, dann wird es unverkennbar sein!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira secoue la tête.{/n} « Non, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, rien du tout ! Pourtant, j'ai parcouru le vaisseau en long, en large et en travers, et je peux vous dire que l'équipage longeait les murs en me voyant. Mais ne vous inquiétez pas, je suis sûre que dès qu'on sera proches, je ne pourrai pas me tromper ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira shakes her head.{/n} "No, Lord Captain, not a thing! And I'm wandering from bay to bay, scaring the crew. But don't worry — I'm sure that as soon as we get close... well, there'll be no mistaking it!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira secoue la tête.{/n} « Non, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, rien du tout ! Pourtant, j'ai parcouru le vaisseau en long, en large et en travers, et je peux vous dire que l'équipage longeait les murs en me voyant. Mais ne vous inquiétez pas, je suis sûre que dès qu'on sera proches, je ne pourrai pas me tromper ! »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}İdira kafasını sallıyor.{/n} "Hayır Lord Kaptan. En ufak bir şey bile yok. Bir bölmeden diğerine dolaşıp duruyorum. Tek yaptığım mürettebatı korkutmak. Ancak endişelenmene gerek yok, yaklaştığımız an eminim ki... Yanılmayacağım!"
languages.original_text: {n}Idira shakes her head.{/n} "No, Lord Captain, not a thing! And I'm wandering from bay to bay, scaring the crew. But don't worry — I'm sure that as soon as we get close... well, there'll be no mistaking it!"

traits.locale_text: {n}İdira kafasını sallıyor.{/n} "Hayır, Lord Kaptan. En ufak bir şey bile yok. Bir bölmeden diğerine dolaşıp duruyorum. Tek yaptığım mürettebatı korkutmak. Ancak endişelenmene gerek yok, yaklaştığımız an eminim ki... Yanılmayacağım!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
